description: MDG Achievement and Poverty Reduction in the Pacific Project

subproject.description:
Output 1: Strengthened capacity of stakeholders to develop & implement MDG-based National Sustainable Development Strategies (NSDS) which integrate environment, energy, climate change, poverty indicators, DRM, HIV and gender, to use costing and budgeting tools and to integrate the MDGs into NSDS

Output 2: Establishment of four UNDP-led MDG Country Development Managers (CDM) in Solomon Islands, Tuvalu, Palau and Nauru

Output 3: Strengthened Capacity of Policy makers in evidence based policy making using available poverty/MDG data 

Output 4/5: Strengthened capacities of: a) PICs, PIFS & CSOs to improve aid effectiveness practices for better development outcomes and MDG achievement and participate effectively in regional and international fora
donor_long: NEW ZEALAND AGY FOR INT'L DEVELOPMENT
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: MDG's for Reducing Poverty&Inq

subproject.description:
Output 1: Pro-poor interventions for ecosystem management and energy security piloted;
Output 2: Policies and institutional arrangements improved for the mainstreaming of poverty-environment-energy nexus through investment in ecosystem services and use of PPP modalities for renewable energy.
donor_long: NEW ZEALAND AGY FOR INT'L DEVELOPMENT
